replies.body:
Nice to have the prestiges finally back!
But will they completely reset after each season? Idk if this is a good idea, because the players awards will be gone if they just reset each 90 days.

Achieving the maximum prestige is impossible, and if you would get to it, you'd only have it for a few days until it would reset again and you get nothing...

replies.body_tagged: well who is going to be the person who does nothing else but grind out their prestige xp?

replies.body:
Some interesting stats for you. (based on Avicus last month stats)
Kills and breaking monuments will bring you 98-99% of your xp.
Average projected earning speed (for first 10 killers) is 252 xp/hour. So, they should spend 9,4 hours every day in the season to reach maximum level.
Projected earning speed for the best killer of last month Objectified is 8803 xp/day. So he should play 6,5 hours every day to reach maximum level
